title: The Bad Luck Chair
features: When she walks into class and finds the notorious Bad Luck Chair placed before her desk, Addy fears the rumors that abound at Brookside Elementary and turns to her classmate, Katie, for guidance on how to rid herself of the bad luck that she is certain will come her way.
description: Sue Wilkowski lives on Long Island, New York.
CB Decker lives in Modesto, California.
